amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 758, in lieu of the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-42, modified by the amendment printed in Part C of House Report 116-334 is adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 758, in lieu of the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on the Judiciary, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-42, modified by the amendment printed in Part C of House Report 116-334 is adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
